description: This Dart source file defines the ApiClient class which manages HTTP client functionality using the Dio package, including setting up base options, interceptors, and singleton access methods.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class that encapsulates HTTP client setup with Dio, including instance management and configuration.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a Dio instance with specified base URL and default headers, adding an AuthInterceptor.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Getter that returns the singleton Dio instance, creating it if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: instance (setter)
methods.description: Setter to assign a custom Dio instance to the singleton.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the singleton Dio instance to null.

methods.name: _createShared
methods.description: Creates and configures a shared Dio instance with environment-specific base URL and interceptors.
